summary: Based on a true story. Liz Murray is a young girl who is taken care of by her loving, but drug-addicted parents. Liz becomes homeless at 15 and after a tragedy comes upon her, she begins her work to finish high school.
cast: Thora Birch|Michael Riley|Robert Bockstael|Makyla Smith|Kelly Lynch|Jennifer Pisana|Aron Tager|Elliot Page|Marla McLean|Marguerite McNeil|Amber Godfrey|Seamus Morrison|John Fulton|Rejean Cournoyer|Mauralea Austin|Kristine Slawter|Mary-Colin Chisholm|Stan Carew|Cecil Wright|Deb Allen|Bailey Williams|Desiree Adams|Adrien Dixon|Ashton Benette|Juanita Peters|Rita Malik|Douglas Mayr|Linda Carvey|Brian Jamieson|Ray Doucette|Sarah Briand|Lise Cormier|Jonathan Langlois-Sadubin|Mahogany Lucas|Grant Rogers|Heather Blom|Jim Fowler|Liz Murray|Lisa Rose Snow
keywords: family relationships|homeless teenager|school|strong female lead|strong female character
title: Una indigente en Harvard: la historia de Liz Murray
